trends: There have been 83 other sightings in Omaha
There were no other sightings in Omaha on or around May 4th 2007
Object Flight Path: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
divs: Sighting Detailswe were driving in our car to go and have dinner. as we were driving i noticed what i thought to be an airplane flying straight down at an alarming speed, so i pointed it out to my wife. As we watched, it came down faster and faster.We were sure we were witnessing a plane crash. My wife started to worry because it no longer looked like an airplane...bigger, and had something coming from the back of it. It was glowing brightly. We were going to call the authorities, but before we could, it immediatly stopped. It kind of changed shape, from oval, to slightly disk shaped, and had a very bright glow. It just hovered, for maybe 2 minutes, and then bolted straight forward, so fast, that it was out of sight in just a couple of seconds. my wife and i just looked at each other, not sure what to do.
Summary: It first looked like a crashing plane, then stopped changed shape, and bolted away
